entities.name: privet drive
entities.description: Privet Drive is Harry's home address where he has been living with his Muggle relatives.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is a wizard and the headmaster of Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry. He is helping Harry to learn how to Apparate.

relationships.description: Dumbledore and Harry are standing in Privet Drive, which has vanished. This implies that Dumbledore was also present at Privet Drive before it vanished.
